---
name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve our work!
title: "[BUG]"
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. The more information you give us, the easier it is for the team to figure out what is going on.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Please make sure to include any and all steps you take as well as snippets of code that you were using. The more we know, the better we can help!

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen, for example:

"firestore_collection.add("DOCUMENT_ID", {'name': 'Document Name', 'active': 'true'}) should add a document to my Firestore Collection"

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Environment:**
 - OS: [e.g. iOS, Android, Windows 10]
 - Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
